reviewText: This was one of my favorite movies as a child!  Now, at 29, I can't wait to show it to my children!  And actually, I'm pretty excited to watch it myself!

I watched this because Jon Voight was in it; I had no idea what it would be about. And Voight is, as usual, fun to watch in this story about a boy who has no father, and has to deal with gangs, a crush on a pretty classmate, and a tendency to feel sorry for himself, and who gets some help in those areas from a lively knight (Voight) that nobody but the boy can see.

It was sweet without being syrupy.
